extendedInfo.description: Adelaide Brisbane Canberra Melbourne Perth Sydney Auckland Wellington Chicago VancouverTripGo is an award winning transport app that has you covered whatever your travel preferences.Quickly find the fastest, cheapest and most environmentally friendly way to get to your destination.â  Instant: Simply open TripGo and see the next trip to any of your favourite locations.â  Real time: Live tracking & service alerts for Sydney Cityrail trains. Live tracking of Sydney Buses & up-to-date arrival and departure times. Send SMS for next departure times where available in Chicago & Vancouver.â  Personalized: Just enter one of your contacts or events rather than addresses.â  Local: Knows bars, restaurants, shops & other points of interest.â  Comprehensive: Travel by bus, car, bicycle, ferry, motorbike, taxi, train or walk.â  Smart: Discover clever combinations, such as cycling to station to catch train into city.â  Informative: Sort trips by time, cost, convenience and carbon emissions.â  Money-wise: See the total cost of any trip including tickets, taxi fare, tolls and car parking fees.â  Plan ahead: Enter future trip and send to your calendar or scheduleâ  Alerts: Lets you know when to get going and when to get off a bus or trainTripGo coverage is constantly growing: We currently support the following cities and transport agencies:Australiaâ  Adelaide, SA: Adelaide Metro including buses, trains and trams.â  Brisbane, QLD: Translink. Coverage includes Sunshine Coast and Gold Coastâ  Canberra, ACT: ACTIONâ  Melbourne, VIC:  Metro Trains, Yarra Trams, Metropolitan Buses and some some airport buses.â  Perth, WA: Transperth, TransBusselton, TransFeraldton, Banbury City Transit.â  Sydney, NSW: CityRail with real-time, Sydney Buses with real-time, Light Rail, Sydney Ferries, Busways Hillbus, 80 other smaller public transport providers, Coverage includes Newcastle, Wollongong & Blue Mountains.New Zealandâ  Auckland: Auckland Transportâ  Wellington: MetLink and all it's train, coach, bus & cable car agencies   USAâ  Chicago, IL: Chicago Transit Authority, Metra, Pace Suburban Bus Service. Other US cities soon to come: Philadelphia, Houston, Seattle.Canadaâ  Vancouver, BC: TransLink, West Coast Express, British Columbia Rapid Transit Company, BC Transit. Soon to come: Toronto.We are continually improving the results we're serving and your feedback is essential for that. We've built our own multi-modal routing engine from the ground up and only use Google and Apple maps for display purposes.Please use the inbuilt feedback function anytime you receive a bad or confusing result and we'll investigate every single one. Note: Driving and cycling routes are in beta: They are there for comparison purposes and not for turn-by-turn navigation.   We recommend Google Map built-in navigation on your Android device.Regarding Permissions: Accesses contacts and calendar information stored on your phone to help with suggestions when searching for a location.No private information is sent to our server except for addresses which we need to turn into coordinates.

reviews.comment: A great app for new bus drivers learning the routes...only improvement needed is to add a print option to this app
reviews.author: Charlene Walker

reviews.title: Stupid App
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t work! It gives me every other option except bus timetables.
reviews.author: Julie Shelley

reviews.comment: Excellent, great and free app
reviews.author: Pete T

reviews.title: crap
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work or crashes on android 2.3
reviews.author: Adrian Dries

reviews.title: Wellington Street bus station
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show any other buses except Cat service at Wellington  Street bus station Perth city. ... please fix it. ...
reviews.author: Param Partap Singh

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Easy to use, perfect
reviews.author: Cindy Pak

reviews.title: Go
reviews.comment: Its Very good
reviews.author: Ravi Singh

reviews.comment: Very helpful,  easy to use
reviews.author: Stephanie S

reviews.title: Some route seems to be missing
reviews.comment: There are routes available using the translink website but not shown here.  There was once it showed me a stop but didn\'t actually go there.  Go to the mobile translink for accuracy otherwise if you miss your bus, it can take more than an hour for the next one.
reviews.author: Patrick Tan

reviews.title: Super easy and fast
reviews.comment: Better than local pt apps. Reminders are great especially arrival appoaching in unfamiliar city
reviews.author: joe wray

reviews.title: Illogical
reviews.comment: WHY CAN\'T YOU CHOOSE THE DESTINATION OR ORIGIN FROM FAVOURITES???? This makes so little sense. It\'s so annoying for me because each time I have to type them manually because the auto complete doesn\'t work- it takes at least a minute for the drop down box below the text entry to appear.  Please fix this.
reviews.author: Aaron Lee

reviews.title: Just what you need, if you ride public transport in SYD
reviews.comment: If you use Sydney buses you will want to have this. Just by clicking in the bus point, you know what buses, at what time and the whole bus trip, so that you can choose the next near your destination. Cool!
reviews.author: Tiago Bruno

reviews.title: Favorite app yet
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried at least 30 transit apps. This is the best. Quick, smooth, and every feature I need.
reviews.author: Tony Calero

reviews.title: Pointless if it never returns any results.
reviews.comment: Tried typing in Parramatta this morning. Such an easy destination to find. Waited 5 minutes and it still sat spinning it\'s wheel. This happens everything now. At least build an sooner reliable data rather than a swish interface. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jay Evans

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Shahid Vegdani

reviews.title: Best I\'ve found for Brisbane
reviews.comment: Really intuitive and powerful. Not to mention beautiful.
reviews.author: Peter Carydias

reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Ganesan Rajan

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy to use
reviews.author: Nico Milan

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Helps with customer enquiries at bus stations
reviews.author: Mark Lockley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It is by far the perfect app if you live in Melbourne and can\'t use Google maps for public transport. You guys rock. Keep it up.Infact I prefer this app over Googlemaps public transport any day.
reviews.author: RIdhav Mahajan
